title: Portakal Dunyas
description: Vegan juice bar on the Asian side of Istanbul, right across the Karakoy-Kabatass-Eminonu ferry station, on the other side of the street, 150 meters to the left from the traffic lights. Offers many choices. All vegan except for honey and milk.
streetAddress: Rihtim Cad. Resit Efendi Sok. No:2 D:1
